name: Aqualance
description:
This is a off-shoot series of the endra series.

It has a young catkin, named Oliver who must become a hero in a 

world corrupted by a demented Goddess of darkness.

Yes..   It IS made in RPG maker MZ but I'm actually going to put effort into this rpg!

Currently it's a demo and i hope you all will be eager for the many new features that i mean to provide in this game!
